parameter.name: X_ADB_SwapFree
parameter.description: The amount of free swap memory, in {{units}}, available on the device.

parameter.name: X_ADB_SwapTotal
parameter.description: The total amount of swap memory, in {{units}}, available on the device.

parameter.name: X_ADB_CPUIOWait
parameter.description: Amount of time the CPU has been waiting for I/O to complete, in {{units}}.

parameter.name: X_ADB_LoadAvg1
parameter.description: CPU load average in the last minute. The system is overloaded when this number exceeds the number of CPU cores.

parameter.name: X_ADB_LoadAvg5
parameter.description: CPU load average in the last 5 minutes. The system is overloaded when this number exceeds the number of CPU cores.

parameter.name: X_ADB_LoadAvg15
parameter.description: CPU load average in the last 15 minutes. The system is overloaded when this number exceeds the number of CPU cores.

parameter.name: X_ADB_ProcessCount
parameter.description: Total number of processes currently running in the system.
